plot outline: An innocent girl from a medical college is found brutally murdered. A court case ensues in which a gang of 9 rich girls from the college are the accused, for ragging and murder. The invincible lawyer LK, appears to argue for and defend the criminals by picking out the loopholes of the case. He then proceeds with his own investigation of the mystery to punish the killers.
title: Ellam Avan Seyal
plot: An innocent girl from a medical college is found brutally murdered. A court case ensues in which a gang of 9 rich girls from the college are the accused, for ragging and murder. The invincible lawyer LK, appears to argue for and defend the criminals by picking out the loopholes of the case. He then proceeds with his own investigation of the mystery to punish the killers.
